message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its immense potential, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,200,000. I believe this reflects its true worth, but I'm open to hearing your thoughts.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1,200,000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for it, considering its value to me. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer. While $1,200,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000.  I believe this price point recognizes the value it brings while still being fair for both of us.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm still thinking $900,000 is a reasonable price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $975,000. I believe this is a fair price that reflects the value I see in the product.
